hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util

Class ActionObservable

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util.ActionObservable

  • public final class ActionObservable
extends Object
    The functional observable helper class with the anamorphism, bind and catamorpism basic operators. Inspired by http://blogs.bartdesmet.net/blogs/bart/archive/2010/01/01/the-essence-of-linq-minlinq.aspx
    Author:
    akarnokd

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      The binding option to convert a source stream of Ts into streaming Rs.

      A catamorphism which creates a single R out of the sequence of Ts by using an aggregator.

      • bind

        public static <T,R> Action1<Action1<Option<R>>> bind(Action1<Action1<Option<T>>> source,
                                     Func1<Action1<Action1<Option<R>>>,T> selector)
        The binding option to convert a source stream of Ts into streaming Rs.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the source type
        R - the converted type
        Parameters:
        source - the source of Ts
        selector - the selector which converts Ts to Rs.
        Returns:
        the action to action that receives option of R

      • ana

        public static <T> Action1<Action1<Option<T>>> ana(T seed,
                                  Func1<Boolean,T> condition,
                                  Func1<T,T> next)
        Anamorphism that creates Ts starting from the seed value until the condition holds. Its equivalent is a for loop: for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the values to generate
        Parameters:
        seed - the initial value
        condition - the condition until the Ts should be produced
        next - the way of compute the next T
        Returns:
        the function of founction of option of T

      • emptyAna

        public static <T> Action1<Action1<Option<T>>> emptyAna()
        The action of action of option of none provider implemented by using anamorphism.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the value (irrelevant)
        Returns:
        the action to action to option

      • singleAna

        public static <T> Action1<Action1<Option<T>>> singleAna(T value)
        The action of action of option of only a single element provider implemented by using anamorphism.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Parameters:
        value - the value to return only once
        Returns:
        the action to action to option of T

      • cata

        public static <T,R> R cata(Action1<Action1<Option<T>>> source,
           R seed,
           Func2<R,R,T> aggregator)
        A catamorphism which creates a single R out of the sequence of Ts by using an aggregator. The method is a greedy operation: it must wait all source values to arrive, therefore, do not use it on infinite sources.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the sequence values
        R - the output type
        Parameters:
        source - the source of the sequence values
        seed - the initial value of the aggregation (e.g., start from zero)
        aggregator - the aggregator function which takes a sequence value and the previous output value and produces a new output value
        Returns:
        the aggregation result
